text: Ivan Grubišić (20 June 1936 - 19 March 2017) was a Croatian Roman Catholic priest, sociologist, and independent politician. He served as a representative in the Croatian Parliament representing the X electoral district from 22 December 2011 through 28 December 2015. Grubišić was born in Dicmo, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. He studied at University of Zagreb and at the University of Zadar. Grubišić died in Split, Croatia on 19 March 2017, aged 80. ==Related pages== *List of sociologists from Europe ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Croatian politicians Category:Roman Catholic priests Category:European sociologists Category:Croatian scientists
title: Ivan Grubišić
